.description:
It was discovered that several deserialization issues existed within
Apache Log4j. An attacker could possibly use these issues to enable
the execution of arbitrary code. (CVE-2022-23302, CVE-2022-23305,
CVE-2022-23307)
action: In general, a standard system update will make all the necessary changes.
isummary:
Apache Log4j could be made to run programs as your login if it opened a
specially crafted file.
title: Apache Log4j vulnerabilities
description:
It was discovered that several deserialization issues existed within Apache
Log4j. An attacker could possibly use these issues to enable the execution
of arbitrary code. (CVE-2022-23302, CVE-2022-23305, CVE-2022-23307)
